New Records: South Africa scored 4-194, their highest score in the T20 World Cup Super 8s
Key Match Events: Kagiso Rabada took three vital wickets, including the dismissal of Andries Gous (80 not out) and Harmeet Singh (38)
Quinton de Kock scored 74 off 26 balls, reaching his half-century in 26 balls and sharing a 110-run partnership with skipper Aiden Markram off 60 deliveries
Heinrich Klaasen dealt in sixes and scored a quick-fire 36 in an unbroken 53-run partnership with Tristan Stubbs (20)
American opener Steven Taylor (24) fell to Rabada when a mistimed shot was caught at mid-off
US captain Aaron Jones fell for a duck to spinner Keshav Maharaj
Post-Match Reflections: Player of the match De Kock said: 'We've had some tricky wickets coming up to this game and I think it's just nice to spend some time out in the middle'
US captain Aaron Jones said: 'It's hard to take the defeat after getting so close. We could have been a little more disciplined bowling-wise'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The US had won the toss and opted to field first, picking up the wicket of Reeza Hendricks early
South Africa's Kagiso Rabada picked up crucial wickets in his spell of 3-18 and restricted the run rate as the US fell short
